posts.post_title: WTB T202 Evers makes a safe slide Evers/Chance
posts.post_content: I am looking for a T202 Evers Makes a Safe Slide with Evers/Chance.  I have found a VG3, which is o.k., but would like to see what else is out there.  Thanks.
